text: Champ-du-Boult is a former commune in the Calvados department in the Normandy region in northwestern France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune Noues de Sienne.Arrêté préfectoral 6 December 2016 ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Calvados department ==References== ==External links== *Commune website Category:Former communes of Calvados (department) Category:Calvados communes articles needing translation from French Wikipedia Category:Populated places disestablished in 2017
title: Champ-du-Boult
